name: MEC Peak Comfort AirGrid Lite Long Sleeve Base Layer - Men's
categories: Peak Comfort AirGrid Lite Long Sleeve Baselay
description:
Wicking coverage and warmth for sweaty activities in cool weather. The Peak Comfort long-sleeved base layer moves sweat away from your body and is quick to dry to prevent chills as you work hard.Made of moisture wicking polyester that is quick to dry.HeiQ anti-odour control lets you wear it more and wash it less.Overedge seams provide a chafe-free wear.Slim fit for easy layering.Includes a small polyester bag for convenient packing.

        Sustainability
